forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 37F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 1C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 32F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 50F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. ESE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 53F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
